EY released an auditing tool for #Ethereum code.   Developers can now copy & paste and quickly find potential bugs.  While there are other auditors, this is first “elite tier” brand to offer such a tool.   A necessary step that occurs before we see insured smart contracts 🔥

Ethereum's existing apps are hard to copy to other blockchains.  Each app needs some kind of liquidity, wants customers, and wants the option to integrate with other apps in the future.  Why would an app developer risk using another blockchain besides Ethereum?
